articles.title: Mahakumbh: Naked ash-smeared ascetics to lead India bathing spectacle - BBC.com
articles.description: Hindu holy men will bathe in the sacred Ganges river on the first major bathing day of Kumbh Mela festival.
articles.content:
The bathing rituals are a key part of the 45-day long festival
Ash-smeared naked Hindu holy men charged into India's most sacred river Ganges at dawn on the first most significant bathing day of the… [+5683 chars]
